mapper.insert: insert into cms2_adv (ID, SPACE_ID, SITE_ID, NAME, TYPE, DISPLAY_COUNT, CLICK_COUNT, START_TIME, END_TIME, STATUS, IS_ENABLE, CORP_ID, IS_DEFAULT, TARGET, LINK, HEIGHT, WIDTH, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFY, PRIORITY, TITLE ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{displayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clickCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isEnable,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{target,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{width,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{priority,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update cms2_adv
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SPACE_ID = #{record.spaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SITE_ID = #{record.siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DISPLAY_COUNT = #{record.displayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CLICK_COUNT = #{record.clickCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},

END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_ENABLE = #{record.isEnable,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CORP_ID = #{record.corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_DEFAULT = #{record.isDefault,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TARGET = #{record.target,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LINK = #{record.link,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEIGHT = #{record.height,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WIDTH = #{record.width,jdbcType=BIGINT},
GMT_CREATE = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GMT_MODIFY = #{record.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TITLE = #{record.title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update cms2_adv set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SPACE_ID = #{record.spaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SITE_ID = #{record.siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DISPLAY_COUNT = #{record.displayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CLICK_COUNT = #{record.clickCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_ENABLE = #{record.isEnable,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{record.corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_DEFAULT = #{record.isDefault,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TARGET = #{record.target,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LINK = #{record.link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEIGHT = #{record.height,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WIDTH = #{record.width,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GMT_CREATE = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_MODIFY = #{record.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TITLE = #{record.title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update cms2_adv set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SPACE_ID = #{record.spaceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SITE_ID = #{record.siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DISPLAY_COUNT = #{record.displayCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CLICK_COUNT = #{record.clickCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, START_TIME = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, END_TIME = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_ENABLE = #{record.isEnable,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CORP_ID = #{record.corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_DEFAULT = #{record.isDefault,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TARGET = #{record.target,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LINK = #{record.link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HEIGHT = #{record.height,jdbcType=BIGINT}, WIDTH = #{record.width,jdbcType=BIGINT}, GMT_CREATE = #{record.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_MODIFY = #{record.gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRIORITY = #{record.priority,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT attach.ATTACH_PATH AS bannerUrl, attach.ATTACH_NAME AS bannerName, adv.LINK AS link, adv.PRIORITY AS priority, space.CODE AS bannerType FROM cms2_adv adv INNER JOIN cms2_adv_space space ON space.id = adv.SPACE_ID INNER JOIN cms2_attach attach ON attach.OBJ_ID = adv.id WHERE adv.IS_ENABLE = 1 AND space.CODE = #{bannerType} ORDER BY adv.PRIORITY
